SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT o.id) FROM bg_order o LEFT JOIN bg_user u ON o.user_id = u.id
INNER JOIN bg_order_item oi ON o.id = oi.order_id INNER JOIN bg_product p ON oi.product_id = p.id
AND o.user_id = #{userId}
AND u.login_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{loginId}, '%')
AND p.product_name CONCAT('%', #{productName}, '%')
AND o.order_status = #{status}
AND date(o.created_at) >= date(#{startDate})
AND date(o.created_at) <= date(#{endDate})

SELECT o.id AS orderId, o.user_id AS userId, u.login_id AS loginId, a.recipient AS recipient, a.recipient_phone AS recipientPhone, o.payment_method AS payType, a.postcode AS postcode, a.address AS address, a.detail_address AS detailAddress, o.payment_price AS totalPrice, o.order_status AS status, o.created_at AS createdAt FROM bg_order o LEFT JOIN bg_user u ON o.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN bg_address a ON o.address_id = a.id
INNER JOIN bg_order_item oi ON o.id = oi.order_id INNER JOIN bg_product p ON oi.product_id = p.id
AND o.user_id = #{userId}
AND u.login_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{loginId}, '%')
AND p.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productName}, '%')
AND o.order_status = #{status}
AND date(o.created_at) >= date(#{startDate})
AND date(o.created_at) <= date(#{endDate})
GROUP BY o.id, o.user_id, u.login_id, a.recipient, a.recipient_phone, o.payment_method, a.postcode, a.address, a.detail_address, o.payment_price, o.order_status, o.created_at
ORDER BY o.payment_price ASC DESC
ORDER BY o.created_at ASC DESC
ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT o.id AS orderId, o.user_id AS userId, u.login_id AS loginId, a.recipient AS recipient, a.recipient_phone AS recipientPhone, o.payment_method AS payType, a.postcode AS postcode, a.address AS address, a.detail_address AS detailAddress, o.payment_price AS totalPrice, o.order_status AS status, o.created_at AS createdAt FROM bg_order o LEFT JOIN bg_user u ON o.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN bg_address a ON o.address_id = a.id WHERE o.id = #{orderId}
